name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 6, at the Hudong campus of Changchun Institute of Technology, the student union went to the senior dormitory to check on the students. During the process, a freshman from the student union had an argument with a senior student in the dormitory, after which the freshman stabbed the senior student with a knife.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 4, Lanzhou R&F has not yet delivered the houses. Hundreds of owners are defending their rights. The police and the deputy district head came to the scene to mediate. The next day, the owners were notified of the surprise delivery of the houses. The government department called to warn some owners not to stir up trouble or take the lead, otherwise they would be detained. However, the owners found that there were serious quality problems in the actual community.

content:
On November 6, famous musician on Bilibili, Gua Zhe Lingfeng, author of "Sunny and Cheerful Big Boy", released a new song "They Haven't Arrived Home Yet", criticizing the policy of not giving a holiday on New Year's Eve.
"Why is he already rich, but always greedy, we are all his gods of wealth"
"We were deprived of our wealth, and they built temples and towers for us"

content:
On November 6, a Xiaohongshu netizen complained that the central enterprise in Fujian where he worked could not pay his salary.
Many people in the comment area said that they also encountered the situation of not being paid.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On November 6, Zhejiang Propaganda Department published a statement publicly supporting Shanghai Halloween.
Although there were sporadic tower-rushing behaviors on Shanghai Halloween, many official media have expressed support for Shanghai Halloween. This is in stark contrast to the strict prevention and mourning of Li Keqiang.

content: A netizen said on Xiaohongshu that he was followed all the way on the subway when he was taking white roses, and was told that white flowers were not allowed on the subway during emergencies.

content: On November 6, in Quanzhou Vanke, a couple reportedly ignited the natural gas in their home due to a quarrel, resulting in an explosion.

content: A teacher complained that after a 23-year-old female teacher in Zhengzhou committed suicide due to excessive pressure from extracurricular work such as assessments and inspections, the first thing that local leaders did was not to reduce the burden on teachers, but to force teachers to participate in mental health training, and the training results continued to be linked to performance appraisals. 🫡
